story.title: A Nordic studio rooted in Lillehammer
story.body: Vanillammer is built on the belief that renovation should feel calm, intentional, and deeply personal. From heritage cabins to modern townhouses, we approach every project with architectural rigor and a designer's eye.
story.body2: Based in Lillehammer, we draw inspiration from the surrounding mountains, the clarity of Scandinavian light, and the tradition of honest craftsmanship.
